body.p: All our releases are available through HTTP. The latest is the 2.4.1.
Debian packages are available in the official Debian distribution, they are included in the current testing and development versions (wheezy and sid).
Additionnaly there are squeeze and wheezy packages and there may be more up-to-date packages available in our local apt repository. Pick the one appropriate for your distribution:
Look on deb.entrouvert.org to get the GPG key of our repository
You can also browse using CGit.
